name: Fried Onion Strips
recipeIngredient: 2 large onions, peeled, cut in half vertically and sliced thin

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a skillet. Add the onions and saute over medium heat, stirring from time to time, until they begin to color. Stir in the turmeric and continue sauteing until the onions are golden brown.

Drain onions, reserving the oil. Separate onions into strips and spread on paper towels to dry. Store onions in an airtight container, where they will keep for months, and reserve oil in a jar for cooking.
